message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. The product seems like a great value, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. In order to accommodate your needs while still valuing the product appropriately, I am proposing an adjusted price of $10,500. This offer includes some additional benefits that I believe will enhance your experience with the product.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $9,750?

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Considering the value and functionality of the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $10,250. This price includes a slight discount compared to the original offer, while still allowing us to maintain a fair valuation of the product.
I appreciate the slight discount, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?

Thank you for your patience, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product to you for $9,875. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions, while still allowing us to maintain a fair valuation of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?

I understand your financial considerations, Bob. In light of this, I am willing to offer the product to you for $9,650. This price reflects a further compromise, aiming to find a balance that satisfies both our interests.
I appreciate your continued efforts to compromise, Alice. However, I've reached my limit and I'm afraid I can only go up to $9,500. Would you be willing to accept this price?
